name: olcCodeJam2018 Epicos
description:
This is an entry for the OLC CodeJam 2018. It includes the source codes in C++. It uses the Pixel Game Engine, and it can be run on Visual Studio.

An executable ()Windows version is included, for those who cannot run the codes themselves.

It generates several particles moving in random directions open Mouse Button Press (and hold).

Key W and Key S  increases and decreases the speed of the particles. So the animation can become interesting for a few minutes.

Cheers!
